flawed_nl_solution:
The weight stack weighed 10*30=<<10*30=30>>30 pounds
So the added weight made it 30*0.2=<<30*0.2=6>>6 pounds heavier
So when he lowered the weight it was 30+6=<<30+6=36>>36 pounds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 30. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
